User Personas

SkyWise Documentation

SkyWise User Personas

Overview

Based on 12 user interviews and secondary research, we identified two primary personas and one edge-case persona that represent our target users.

Primary Persona: The Road Warrior

â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Edge-Case Persona: The Reluctant Traveler

David Park

â•‘                                                                               â•‘
â•‘   WHY THIS PERSONA MATTERS                                                    â•‘
â•‘   â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€                                                    â•‘
â•‘                                                                               â•‘
â•‘   David represents the skeptical user who:                                    â•‘
â•‘   â€¢ Has been burned by technology before                                      â•‘
â•‘   â€¢ Values human assistance over automation                                   â•‘
â•‘   â€¢ May be forced to adopt new tools due to circumstances                     â•‘
â•‘   â€¢ Needs extra trust-building and transparency                               â•‘
â•‘                                                                               â•‘
â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£
â•‘                                                                               â•‘
â•‘   DESIGN IMPLICATIONS                                                         â•‘
â•‘   â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€                                                         â•‘
â•‘                                                                               â•‘
â•‘   For users like David, we must:                                              â•‘
â•‘                                                                               â•‘
â•‘   1. âœ… Show EVERYTHING the AI does (no hidden actions)                       â•‘
â•‘   2. âœ… Require explicit confirmation for ALL changes                         â•‘
â•‘   3. âœ… Provide easy way to undo/correct                                      â•‘
â•‘   4. âœ… Use plain language, avoid tech jargon                                 â•‘
â•‘   5. âœ… Offer manual fallback options                                         â•‘
â•‘                                                                               â•‘
â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Persona Comparison Matrix

AttributeMarcus (Road Warrior)Emma (Planner)David (Reluctant)
Age422955
Travel Frequency4-6x/month6-8x/year1-2x/month
Primary DeviceMobileDesktopDesktop
AI ComfortMedium-HighHighLow
Top NeedSpeedOrganizationTransparency
Key FeatureCalendar conflictEmail importUndo system
Trust FactorNeeds explanationTrusts but verifiesSkeptical

Jobs To Be Done

Marcus's JTBD

"When I need to book a flight between meetings, I want to do it in under 2 minutes without creating calendar conflicts, so I can focus on my actual job."

Emma's JTBD

"When I receive a flight confirmation, I want it automatically extracted and organized, so I don't have to manually track everything across multiple apps."

David's JTBD

"When I have to book my own travel, I want to understand and control every step, so I don't make expensive mistakes."
